lexUnit.name: query.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a question, especially one expressing doubt.

sentence.text: I have to take payments from customers , take service calls and deal with customer queries .
In reply to my radio query he replied that he was low on fuel .
Travis 's mocking query made her start .
An information office is shortly to be set up by East Hampshire District Council to answer queries about the drainage work taking place in the village .
If you have any queries about the help you may get , ask at the hospital .
If you have any queries about the enclosed information please do not hesitate to contact us .
While we are happy to answer any queries about our own products , we can not answer for the content of other publisher 's works .
` No chance , " she stated swiftly on a light laugh , and quickly dismissed the subject by turning to her host with a query about the wine that went so well with the meal .
Our advisory services answer thousands of queries from people all over the country .

He ( and the Assistant Dean ) also counsel many other students on the Course who consider that they have problems , and also respond to queries from other staff as to how best to advise individual students .
We should be delighted , here at headquarters , to answer queries regarding levels of membership ( which vary according to experience ) and the charges for membership .
Make these queries to Dr. Dillenius .
The delegation subsequently expressed its dissatisfaction with the inability of State ministers and officials to respond fully to various queries raised by its members .
All indemnity queries however will continue to be referred to Head Office Branch Claims for a decision .
I have to take payments from customers , take service calls and deal with customer queries .
We answer three of your queries about getting hair into tip-top condition .
I still wonder at the curt response to my query .
Send him your technical queries at the usual address .
So let me have your queries regarding these machines as well .
I ca n't do much to answer your queries about Kaama .
` Please direct your queries about gown number eighty-two to Fabbiano . "
Montgomery answered Sergeant Allen 's query with an economical monosyllable .
I trust this answered your queries on the increase in the annual subscription and your members ' satisfaction , that they still consider it good value for money .
On the last day of the Sale one senior elder was heard to say in response to another 's query as to how he was faring , ` Well , I 've just make 40p which I 'm very pleased about " .
He thanked her but countered cunningly with a query about who her friends might be .
If you have a query about information mentioned in a particular feature ask the person who wrote it !
But Harriet had returned to Meredith 's query about the cottages .

He ( and the Assistant Dean ) also counsel many other students on the Course who consider that they have problems , and also respond to queries from other staff as to how best to advise individual students .
